Class ComputerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • thing.ComputerTest

  • public class ComputerTest
extends Object
    Confirm that the methods of Computer work as expected.
    Author:
    Andrew Dallow

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ComputerTest() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setUp()
      Setup test computer, person, and locations before each test.
      void testLogOff()
      Confirm that logOff() logs a person off from the computer.
      void testLogon()
      Confirm that logon() logs a person onto the computer in the same room or does nothing if someone is already logged on or computer is in a different room.
      void testSetRobotControl()
      Confirm that setRobotControl sets the computer controller for the robot.
      void testToString()
      Confirm toString produces the correct string.
